Key.Original: Waiting for the server to be ready...
extDB failed to load, please contact an administrator.
Put the amount you want to compensate:
You cannot teleport the player here because they are inside of a vehicle.
Key.Polish: Nie można teleportować graczy tutaj, ponieważ są one wewnątrz pojazdu.

Key.Original: You are already querying a player.

You are about to give yourself $%1 to compensate to another player

You must give this cash to the person you are compensating manually.
Key.Polish:
Właśnie przydzieliłeś sobie $%1 w celu rekompensaty graczowi

Musisz przekazać te środki osobiście osobie poszkodowanej.

Key.Original: You have added $%1 to your account.

Key.Polish: Nie można obracać kwotami wyższymi niż $999,999!

Key.Original: Please type in the amount to compensate.
Your Admin Level is not high enough.
Key.Polish: Nie masz wystarczających uprawnień, za niski poziom administracyjny

Key.Original: Hit spacebar to place the container.
Your faction is not allowed to chop vehicles!
Key.Polish: Twoja frakcja nie może posiekać pojazdy!

Key.Original: You can't do this while you surrender
Key.Polish: Nie można tego zrobić, gdy się poddasz

Key.Original: You can't gather this resource with this vehicle!
Key.Polish: You can't gather this resource with this vehicle!

Key.Original: You have no business using this.
Key.Polish: Nie masz działalność z wykorzystaniem tego produktu.

Key.Original: Admin %1 has opened the debug console.
You cannot drop keys to a vehicle which is locked and you are inside of.
Key.Polish: You cannot drop keys to a vehicle which is locked and you are inside of.

Key.Original: You can't deposit more then $999,999 at a time
Key.Polish: Możesz jednorazowo zdeponować nie więcej niż $999,999

Key.Original: The amount entered isn't a numeric value.
You need to select someone to transfer to
The player selected doesn't seem to exist?
Key.Polish: Wybrany gracz wydaje się nie występować w grze
Możesz jednorazowo przelać nie więcej niż $999,999

Key.Original: You don't have that much in your bank account!
Key.Polish: Nie masz tyle środków na koncie!

Key.Original: You don't have that much in your gang bank account!
Key.Polish: Nie ma tego dużo na koncie bankowym gang!

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account, to transfer $%1 you will need $%2 as a tax fee.
Key.Polish: Nie masz wystarczająco dużo środków na końcie, do przelewu $%1 będziesz potrzebował jeszcze $%2 na opłatę

Key.Original: You have transfered $%1 to %2.\n\nA tax fee of $%3 was taken for the wire transfer.
Key.Polish: Przelałeś $%1 do %2.\n\nA opłata $%3 pobrana przez WIRE TRANSFER

Key.Original: You have withdrawn $%1 from your bank account
You have withdrawn $%1 from your gang.
Someone is already trying to withdraw from your gang.
Key.Polish: Ktoś już próbował wycofać się ze swojego gangu.

Key.Original: You do not have that much cash on you.
Key.Polish: Nie masz przy sobie tyle pieniędzy

Key.Original: You have deposited $%1 into your bank account
You have deposited $%1 into your gang's bank account
Someone is already trying to deposit into your gang's bank account.
Key.Polish: Ktoś jest już stara się o wpłatę na rachunek bankowy swojego gangu.

Key.Original: You are not in a Gang!
You must enter a message to send!
Key.Polish: You must enter a message to send!

Key.Original: You must select a player you are sending the text to!
Key.Polish: You must select a player you are sending the text to!

Key.Original: You have sent a message to all EMS Units.
Key.Polish: You have sent a message to all EMS Units.

Key.Original: To create a gang it costs $%1
You must create a gang first before capturing it!
Your gang already has control over this hideout!
Key.Polish: Twój gang aktualnie kontroluje tę kryjówkę !

Key.Original: Only one person shall capture at once!
Key.Polish: Przejmowanie powinna przeprowadzić na raz tylko jedna osoba

Key.Original:
This hideout is controlled by %1.

Are you sure you want to take over their gang area?
Key.Polish:
Ta kryjówka jest kontrolowana przez %1.

Jesteś pewny że chcesz przjąć ten rejon.

Key.Original: %1 and his gang: %2 - have taken control of a local hideout!
Key.Polish: %1 i jego gang: %2 - przejął kontrolę nad kryjówką!

Key.Original: You can't have a gang name longer then 32 characters.
Key.Polish: Nazwa gangu może posiadać maksymalnie 32 znaki

Key.Original: You have invalid characters in your gang name. It can only consist of Numbers and letters with an underscore
Key.Polish: Masz nieprawidłowe znaki w nazwie gangu - tylko litery i cyfry oraz podkreślnik

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account.\n\nYou lack: $%1
Key.Polish: Nie masz tyle pieniędzy na koncie.\n\nYou brakuje: $%1

Key.Original: You have created the gang %1 for $%2

You are about to disband the gang, by disbanding the gang it will be removed from the database and the group will be dropped.

Are you sure you want to disband the group? You will not be refunded the price for creating it.
Key.Polish:
Chcesz rozwiązać gang, po jego rozwiązaniu zostanie on usunięty z bazy danych i cała grupa zostanie rozwiązana.

Naprawdę chcesz rozwiązać grupę? Nie dostaniesz zwrotu środków za przeznaczonych na stworzenie gangu.

Key.Original: The leader has disbanded the gang.

%1 has invited you to a gang called %2
If you accept the invitation you will be a part of their gang and will have access to the gang funds and controlled gang hideouts.
Key.Polish:
%1 zaprosił cię do gangu o nazwie %2
Jeżeli zaakceptujesz zaproszenie będziesz członkiem gangu i uzyskasz dostęp do funduszy gangu oraz jego kryjówek

Key.Original: You are about to invite %1 to your gang, if they accept the invite they will have access to the gang's funds.
Key.Polish: Właśnie zaprosiłeś %1 do gangu, jeśli zaakceptuje zaproszenie będzie miał dostęp do funduszy gangu.

Key.Original: You need to select a person to invite!
Key.Polish: Musisz zaznaczyć osobę aby ją zaprosić

Key.Original: You have sent a invite to your gang to %1
Key.Polish: Wysłałeś zaproszenie do twojego gangu do %1

Key.Original: Your gang has reached its maximum allowed slots, please upgrade your gangs slot limit.
Key.Polish: Twój gang osiągnął maksymalną pojemność, powiększ swój gang!

Key.Original: You need to select a person to kick!
You cannot leave the gang without appointing a new leader first!
Key.Polish: Nie możesz opuścić gangu bez przekazania komuś szefostwa nad gangiem

Key.Original:
You are about to transfer leadership over to %1
By transferring leadership you will no longer be in control of the gang unless ownership is transferred back.
Key.Polish:
Przekazałeś kierowanie gangiem %1
W związku z tym nie będzesz od tej chwili kontroli nad gangiem chyba, że kierowownictwo zostanie ci powierzone ponownie.

Key.Original: You need to select a person first!
You have been made the new leader.
Key.Polish: You have been made the new leader.

Key.Original: You are about to upgrade the maximum members allowed for your gang.
Key.Polish: Chcesz zwiększyć maksymalną ilość członków w gangu.

Key.Original: You do not have enough money in your bank account to upgrade the gangs maximum member limit.
Key.Polish: Nie posiadasz wystarczającej ilości środków na koncie aby powiększyć gang

Key.Original: You have upgraded from %1 to %2 maximum slots for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>
Key.Polish: Zwiększyłeś ilość możliwych członków gangu z %1 do %2 for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%3</t>

Key.Original: You are already in a gang.
This player is already in a gang.
Key.Polish: Ten gracz jest już w gangu.

Key.Original: You have been kicked out of the gang.
Key.Polish: You have been kicked out of the gang.

Key.Original: This garage has already been bought!
You are not the owner of this house!
This garage is available for $%1
This building is a Gang Hideout!
Are you sure you want to sell your garage? It will sell for: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>
You do not own a garage here!
You don't have $%1 in your bank account
Sorry but %1 was classified as a destroyed vehicle and was sent to the scrap yard.
Key.Polish: Przepraszamy ale %1 został sklasyfikowany jako zniszczony i został odesłany na złom.

Key.Original: Sorry but %1 is already active somewhere in the world and cannot be spawned.
Key.Polish: Przepraszamy ale %1 jest aktywny gdzieś na mapie i nie może zostać wyciągnięty.

Key.Original: There is already a vehicle on the spawn point. You will be refunded the cost of getting out out.
Key.Polish: W strefie parkowania znajduje się już pojazd. Środki za parkowanie zostaną zwrócone.

Key.Original: That vehicle is a rental and cannot be stored in your garage.
Key.Polish: Pojazd wynajęty, nie możesz go schować w garażu.

Key.Original: That vehicle doesn't belong to you therefor you cannot store it in your garage.
Key.Polish: Pojazd nie należy do ciebie nie możesz go schować w garażu. Ale zawsze możesz podjechać do dziupli!

Key.Original: The vehicle has been stored in your garage.
The server is trying to store the vehicle...
Key.Polish: Serwer próbuje schować pojazd w garażu ...

Key.Original: There isn't a vehicle near the NPC.
Key.Polish: Nie ma pojazdu w pobliżu NPC

Key.Original: Key Chain - Current List of Keys
View distance while in a land vehicle
View distance while in a air vehicle
%1 has been added to the wanted list.
You do not have $%1 for a %2
You have collected some raw %1 meat
Key.Polish: You have collected some raw %1 meat

Key.Original: You have taken some turtle meat
You are to deliver this package to %1.
You failed to deliver the package because you died.
Key.Polish: Nie dostarczyłeś przesyłki z uwagi na to że zmarłeś.

Key.Original: You do not have $%1 to be healed
You do not need to be healed!
You need to be within 5m while the doctor is healing you
Key.Polish: Musisz być w pobliżu doktora gdy ten cię leczy - ok 5m

Key.Original: %1 your %2 is being impounded by the police.
You have impounded a %1\n\nYou have received $%2 for cleaning up the streets!
You paid $%1 for impounding your own %2.

Key.Polish: Pojazd jest w trakcie wydobycia surowców

Key.Original: You are not near a resource field
Key.Polish: Nie jesteś w pobliżu pola surowców

Key.Original: You cannot turn the vehicle on when mining
Key.Polish: Nie możesz poruszać pojazdem w trakcie wydobycia.

Key.Original: Completed cycle, the device has mined %1 %2
You have packed up the spike strip.
%1 has been placed in evidence, you have received $%2 as a reward.
Key.Polish: %1 umieszczony w dowodach, otrzymujesz w nagrodę $%2

Key.Original: You must wait at least 3 minutes in jail before paying a bail.
Key.Polish: Musisz poczekać conajmniej 3 minuty w więzieniu zanim zapłacisz kaucję.

Key.Original: You do not have $%1 in your bank account to pay bail.
Key.Polish: Nie masz $%1 na koncie aby zapłacić kaucję.

Key.Original: You can't chop a vehicle while a player is near!
Key.Polish: Nie można posiekać pojazd podczas gdy gracz jest w pobliżu!

Key.Original: Your illegal items have been put into evidence.
Key.Polish: Twoje nielegalne pozycje zostały wprowadzone do dowodów.

Key.Original: This vehicle has no information, it was probably spawned in through cheats. \n\nDeleting vehicle.
Key.Polish: Pojazd bez informacji servera, prawdopodobnie umieszczony przez hakera \n\n usuwam pojazd.

Key.Original: You are already doing an action. Please wait for it to end.
Key.Polish: Aktualnie wykonujesz jakąś akcję poczekaj aż skończysz.

Key.Original: A vehicle was searched and has $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.Polish: Podczas przeszukania znalezono narkotyki/kontrabandę o wartości $%1

Key.Original: A container of house was searched and has $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.Polish: Podczas przeszukania znalezono narkotyki/kontrabandę o wartości $%1

Key.Original: You have been pulled out of the vehicle.
Sending information to server please wait.....
An action is already being processed...
You don't have enough space for that amount!
You don't have that much money!
You don't have enough room for that item.
Key.Polish: Nie masz wystarczająco miejsca na tą rzecz.

Key.Original: You need $%1 to process without a license!
Key.Polish: Potrzebujesz $%1 w celu przetworzenia bez licencji

Key.Original: You can't rapidly use action keys!
You do not have enough funds in your bank account.
Key.Polish: Nie masz wystarczających środków w banku.

Key.Original: Couldn't add it to your inventory.
Key.Polish: Nie można dodać tego do twojego wyposażenia

Key.Original: You haven't eaten anything in awhile, You should find something to eat soon!
Key.Polish: Zaczynasz być głodny, poszukaj czegoś do jedzenia!

Key.Original: You are starting to starve, you need to find something to eat otherwise you will die.
Key.Polish: Długo nie jadłeś, zjedz coś lub zginiesz z głodu.

Key.Original: You are now starving to death, you will die very soon if you don't eat something.
Key.Polish: Zaczynasz słabnąć z głodu zjedz coś lub zginiesz !!!

Key.Original: You haven't drank anything in awhile, You should find something to drink soon.
Key.Polish: Zaczynasz być spragniony, powinienieś poszukać czegoś do picia.

Key.Original: You haven't drank anything in along time, you should find something to drink soon or you'll start to die from dehydration.
Key.Polish: Długo nic nie piłeś, napij się czegoś bo możesz zginąć z pragnienia.

Key.Original: You are now suffering from severe dehydration find something to drink quickly!
Key.Polish: Zaczynasz słabnąć z pragnienia, wypij coś inaczej zginiesz!!!
Umarłeś z uwagi na odwodnienie organizmu

Key.Original: You are over carrying your max weight! You will not be able to run or move fast till you drop some items!
Key.Polish: Niesiesz maksymalny ciężar, nie będziesz mógł biegać ani szybko chodzić dopuki nie wyrzucisz jakiejś rzeczy

Informacja o pojeździe
Właściciel
%1

Key.Original: You couldn't effectively seize any items. Try again.
Key.Polish: Nie można skutecznie wykorzystać żadnych przedmiotów. Spróbuj ponownie.

Key.Original: You can't do that from inside the vehicle!
Key.Polish: Nie możesz tego wykonać z wntrza pojazdu!

Key.Original: You can't gather from inside a car!
Key.Polish: Nie możesz zbierać z wnętrza samochodu

Key.Original: You are not allowed to loot dead bodies.
You have been frozen by an administrator.
You have teleported to your selected position.
You have been unfrozen by an administrator.
You didn't select an item you wanted to give.
Key.Polish: Nie wybrano element, który chciał dać.

Key.Original: You didn't enter an actual number format.
You need to enter an actual amount you want to give.
Key.Polish: Musisz podać rzeczywistą kwotę, którą chcesz dać.

Key.Original: You need to enter an actual amount you want to remove.
Key.Polish: Musisz podać rzeczywistą kwotę, którą chcesz usunąć.

Key.Original: The selected player is not within range.
Key.Polish: Wybrany gracz nie jest w zasięgu.

Key.Original: Couldn't give that much of that item, maybe you don't have that amount?
Key.Polish: nie mógł dać, że wiele z tego elementu, może nie masz tej kwoty?

Key.Original: You don't have that much to give!
You recently robbed the bank! You can't give money away just yet.
Key.Polish: Niedawno obrabował bank! Nie można dać pieniądze w błoto jeszcze.

Key.Original: You did not select a vehicle.
You do not own any vehicles.
You did not select a player.
You have given %1 keys to your %2.
%1 has gave you keys for a %2.
Key.Polish: %1 has gave you keys for a %2.

Key.Original: You cannot remove the keys to your house!
Key.Polish: Nie można usunąć klucze do swojego domu!

Key.Original: You did not select anything to remove.
Key.Polish: Nie zrobił nic, aby usunąć wybrać.

Key.Original: Could not remove that much of that item. Maybe you do not have that amount?
Key.Polish: Nie można usunąć, że wiele z tego elementu. Może nie masz tej kwoty?

Key.Original: You have successfully removed %1 %2 from your inventory.
Something went wrong; the menu will not open?
Key.Polish: Coś poszło nie tak; menu nie otworzy?

Key.Original: You cannot store that in anything but a land vehicle!
Key.Polish: Nie można zapisać, że w nic poza pojazdem lądowym!

Key.Original: You don't have that much cash on you to store in the vehicle!
Key.Polish: Nie ma tego dużo gotówki na ciebie do przechowywania w pojeździe!

Key.Original: The vehicle is either full or cannot hold that much.
Key.Polish: Pojazd jest albo w pełnym lub nie można uznać, że dużo.

Key.Original: Couldn't remove the items from your inventory to put in the vehicle.
Key.Polish: Pojazd jest albo w pełnym lub nie można uznać, że dużo.

Key.Original: This is an illegal item and cops are near by. You cannot dispose of the evidence.
Key.Polish: Jest to nielegalne element i policjanci są w pobliżu. Nie można pozbyć się dowodów.

Key.Original: You cannot remove an item when you are in a vehicle.
Key.Polish: Nie można usunąć element, kiedy jesteś w pojeździe.

Key.Original: You are now spectating %1.\n\nPress F10 to stop spectating.
Key.Polish: Grasz teraz spectating %1.\n\nNaciśnij klawisz F10, aby zatrzymać spectating.

Key.Original: You have teleported %1 to your location.
The header cannot be over %1 characters
You need $%1 to send a broadcast!
You have been arrested, wait your time out. If you attempt to respawn or reconnect your time will increase!
Key.Polish: Zostałeś aresztowany, poczekaj na koniec kary. Jeśli się rozłączysz albo odrodzisz twoja kara zostanie powiększona

Key.Original:
For being arrested you have lost the following licenses if you own them

Firearms License
Rebel License
Key.Polish:
Z uwagi na aresztowanie straciłeś następujące licencje jeśli je posiadałeś 

Pozwolenie na broń 
Trening Rebelianta

Key.Original: You have escaped from jail, you still retain your previous crimes and now have a count of escaping jail.
Key.Polish: Uciekłeś z więzienia, dalej jesteś ścigany za poprzednie przestępstwa i dodatkowo za ucieczkę.

Key.Original: You have served your time in jail and have been released.
Key.Polish: Odbyłeś swoją karę zostałeś zwolniony z więzienia.

Key.Original: You have paid your bail and are now free.
You have lost all your motor vehicle licenses for vehicular manslaughter.
Key.Polish: Straciłeś wszystkie uprawnienia na pojazdy z uwagi na ciągłe zabijanie ludzi pojazdami.

Key.Original: You have lost your firearms license for manslaughter.
Key.Polish: Straciłeś pozwolenie na broń z uwagi na zabijanie ludzi z broni palnej

Key.Original: Someone is already accessing the safe..
Key.Polish: Ktoś właśnie włamuje się do sejfu!

Key.Original: There needs to be %1 or more cops online to continue.
You need to select an item!
There isn't %1 gold bar(s) in the safe!
Key.Polish: W sejfie nie ma % sztab złota!

Key.Original: %2 got back a blacklisted vehicle near %1.
Key.Polish: %2 wrócić do czarnej listy pojazd pobliżu %1.
Nie ma osoby ukaranej mandatem - nie istnieje

Key.Original: Tickets can not be more than $200,000!
Key.Polish: Mandat nie może być wyższy niż $200.000!

Key.Original: You don't have enough money in your bank account or on you to pay the ticket.
Key.Polish: Nie masz środków na koncie aby zapłacić mandat.

Key.Original: %1 couldn't pay the ticket due to not having enough money.
Key.Polish: %1 nie może zapłacić mandatu bo nie ma tylu środków na koncie

Key.Original: You have paid the ticket of $%1
%1 has given you a ticket for $%2
You have collected a bounty of $%1 for arresting a criminal.
Key.Polish: Otrzymujesz nagrodę w wysokości $%1 za aresztowanie poszukiwanego kryminalisty.

Key.Original: You have collected a bounty of $%1 for killing a wanted criminal, if you had arrested him you would of received $%2.
Key.Polish: Otrzymujesz nagrodę w wysokości $%1 za zabicie poszukiwanego kryminalisty, w przypadku gdybyś go aresztował otrzymałbyć $%2.

Key.Original: %1 has $%2 worth of contraband on them.
Key.Polish: %1 miał przy sobie kontrabandę o wartości $%2.

Key.Original: %1 was identified as the bank robber!
You are not near a door!
You need to enable Picture in Picture (PiP) through your video settings to use this!
Key.Polish: Musisz włączyć Obraz w obrazie (PiP) w ustawieniach graficznych aby tego używać!
Nie znaleziono niczego nielegalnego w pojeździe

Key.Original: $%1 from the Federal Reserve robbery was returned from the robber being killed.
Key.Polish: $%1 z kradzieży w Banku zostało zwrócone po zabiciu włamywacza.

Key.Original: The vault is now fixed and re-secured.
You can't store anything but gold bars in the safe.
Key.Polish: Nie możesz składować niczego poza sztabami złota w sejfie.

Key.Original: Couldn't remove the item(s) from your inventory to put in the safe.
Key.Polish: Nie można usunąć rzeczy z twojego wyposażenia aby włożyć je do sejfu

Key.Original: No one has sold to this dealer recently.
Key.Polish: Nikt nie sprzedawał ostatnio u dilera.

Key.Original: The following people have been selling to this dealer recently.
Key.Polish: Ostatnio u dilera sprzedawali następujący ludzie.

Key.Original: You have been released automatically for excessive restrainment time
Key.Polish: Zostałeś automatycznie rozkuty z uwagi na długi upływ czasu od skucia.

Key.Original: Who do you think you are?
You tried to give %1 %2 %3 but they couldn't hold that so it was returned.
Key.Polish: Próbowałeś dać %1 %2 %3 lecz gracz nie mógł tego unieść, przedmioty zostały zwrócone.

Key.Original: %1 returned %2 %3 because they couldn't hold that amount.
Key.Polish: %1 zwrócił %2 %3 ponieważ nie mógł tego unieść

Key.Original: %1 has gave you %2 but you can only hold %3 so %4 was returned back.
Key.Polish: %1 dał ci %2 lecz możesz unieść tylko %3, w związku z tym zwróciłeś %4.

Key.Original: Do you want to add this item to your weapon or inventory? If you add it to your weapon your current existing attachment will be lost!
Key.Polish: Chcesz dodać tę rzecz do broni lub wyposażenia? Jeśli to zrobisz twoje aktualne wyposażenie broni zostanie zmienione na nowo zakupione i przepadnie!

Key.Original: You are not allowed to look into someone's backpack!
Key.Polish: Nie możesz zaglądać do czyichś plecaków!

Key.Original: You are not allowed to access this vehicle while its locked.
Key.Polish: Nie masz dostępu do pojazdu gdy ten jest zamknięty

Key.Original: This vehicle's trunk is in use, only one person can use it at a time.
Key.Polish: Bagażnik pojazdu jest w użyciu, na raz może korzystać z niego tylko jedna osoba.

Key.Original: You need to install storage containers to have storing capabilities!
Key.Polish: Musisz zainstalować pojemniki aby uzyskać możliwość składowania rzeczy

Key.Original: This vehicle isn't capable of storing virtual items.
Key.Polish: Ten pojazd nie przechowuje wirtualnych przedmiotów

Key.Original: The vehicle either doesn't exist or is destroyed.
Key.Polish: Pojazd nie istnieje lub jest zniszczony

Key.Original: The vehicle doesn't have that many of that item.
Key.Polish: Pojazd nie posiada takiej ilości rzeczy.

Key.Original: Your sound was set to normal mode!
Key.Polish: Dzwięk został ustawiony w tryb normalny!

Key.Original: Your sound was set to fade mode!
Key.Polish: Dzwięk został ustawiony w tryb wyciszony!

Key.Original: An RPG game mode developed by Tonic.
Key.Polish: Tryb gry RPG stworzona przez Tonic.

Key.Original: Error saving container, couldn't locate house?
Key.Polish: Błąd w zapisywaniu pojemnika, nie można zlokalizować domu.

Key.Original: You are not allowed to access this storage container without the owner opening it.
Key.Polish: Nie masz dostępu do pojemnika dopóki właściciel go nie otworzy.

Key.Original: There are no houses near you.
The storage box is over the stairs!
You are not the owner of the house.
You are not near a door!
This house was recently sold and is still processing in the database.
Key.Polish: Ten dom został ostatnio sprzedany i trwa jego przetwarzanie w bazie danych.

Key.Original: You do not have a home owners license!
You can only own %1 houses at a time.
You do not have enough money!

This house is available for $%1
It supports up to %2 storage containers
Key.Polish:
Ten dom jest dostępny za $%1
Ma %2 miejsca na pojemniki do przechowywania wyposażenia

Key.Original: This house doesn't belong to anyone.
This person is not online there for you cannot raid their house!
Key.Polish: Osoba nie jest na serwerze, nie możesz przeszukać domu.

Key.Original: %1 your house is being raided by the cops!
Key.Polish: %1 twój dom jest kontrolowany przez policję!

Key.Original: There is nothing in this house.
You went too far away from the house!
A house was raided and had $%1 worth of drugs / contraband.
Key.Polish: Podczas przeszukania domu znaleziono kontrabandę o wartości $%1.

Key.Original: Are you sure you want to sell your house? It will sell for: <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>
Key.Polish: Jesteś pewny że chcesz sprzedać dom za <t color='#8cff9b'>$%1</t>

Key.Original: Are you sure you want to remove it?
Key.Polish: Czy na pewno chcesz go usunąć?

Key.Original: This house is already owned even though you shouldn't be seeing this hint...
Key.Polish: Ten dom jest już własnością, nawet jeśli nie należy widzieć tę wskazówkę ...

Key.Original: There is no owner for this house.
There isn't a chopper on the helipad!
You need $1,000 to service your chopper
The vehicle is no longer alive or on the helipad!
Key.Polish: Pojazd nie jest dłużej dostępny na lądowisku

Key.Original: Your chopper is now repaired and refuelled.
This can only be used on a vault.
There is already a charge placed on this vault.
Key.Polish: Już założono ładunek wybuchowy na skarbcu.

Key.Original: A blasting charge has been placed on the federal reserves vault, You have till the clock runs out to disarm the charge!
Key.Polish: Ładunek wybuchowy został założony na skarbcu rezerw federalnych, musisz rozbroić ładunek nim wybuchnie!

Key.Original: The timer is ticking! Keep the cops away from the vault!
Key.Polish: Zegar tyka! Trzymaj policję z dala od skarbca!

Key.Original: You must open the container before placing the charge!
Key.Polish: Musisz otworzyć pojemnik przed wprowadzeniem opłat!

Key.Original: You are not looking at a house door.
!!!!! SOMEONE IS BREAKING INTO THE FEDERAL RESERVE !!!!!!
Key.Polish: !!!!!! KTOŚ SIĘ WŁAMUJE DO BANKU REZERW FEDERALNYCH !!!!!

Key.Original: %1 was seen breaking into a house.
Key.Polish: %1 był widziany jak włamywał się do domu.

Key.Original: You must open the outside doors before opening it!
Key.Polish: Musisz otworzyć zewnętrzne drzwi przed otwarciem!

Key.Original: You are not looking at a vault.
There is no charge on the vault?
You need to look at the vehicle you want to refuel!
Key.Polish: Musisz spojrzeć w kierunku pojazdu który chcesz zatankować!

Key.Original: You need to be closer to the vehicle!
Spend $%1 to refuel your Empty Fuel Canister?
Key.Polish: Wydać $%1 zatankować swój pustego zasobnika paliwa?

Key.Original: You must be closer to the fuel pump!
Key.Polish: Você deve estar mais perto da bomba de combustível!

Key.Original: You have successfully refuelled the Fuel Canister!
This vehicle is already in your key-chain.
Key.Polish: Masz już klucze do tego pojazdu.

Key.Original: You got to far away from the target.
You now have keys to this vehicle.
Key.Polish: Masz teraz klucze do tego pojazdu

Key.Original: %1 was seen trying to lockpick a car.
Key.Polish: %1 był widziany jak próbował włamać się do samochodu.

Key.Original: You are not near a mine!
You can't mine from inside a car!
You need to be inside your house to place this.
Key.Polish: Musisz być wewnątrz własnego domu aby to umieścić.

Key.Original: You cannot place any more storage containers in your house.
Key.Polish: Nie masz więcej miejsca na pojemniki w tym domu.

Key.Original: No more free storage spaces in your house.
Key.Polish: Brak wolnych miejsc na pojemniki w domu.

Key.Original: You need to select an item first!
You can now run farther for 3 minutes
Key.Polish: Możesz przez 3 minuty biec bez wysiłku

Key.Original: You already have a Spike Strip active in deployment
You can't refuel the vehicle while in it!
Key.Polish: Nie możesz zatankować pojazdu gdy w nim jesteś!

Key.Original: You need to stay within 10m to process.
Key.Polish: Musisz być w odległości 10 m aby przetwarzanie się odbyło.

Key.Original: You have no inventory space to process your materials.
Key.Polish: Nie masz miejsca na przetwarzanie swoich zapasów materiałów.

Key.Original: Only part of your materials could be processed due to reaching your maximum weight.
Key.Polish: Tylko część swoich materiałów może być przetwarzane ze względu na osiągnięcie maksymalnej wadze.

Key.Original: You need $%1 to process without a license!
Key.Polish: Musisz mieć $%1 aby przetworzyć bez odpowiedniej licencji

Key.Original: %1 has revived you and a fee of $%2 was taken from your bank account for their services.
Key.Polish: %1 pobrał opłatę w wysokości $%2 za reanimację i przywrócenie funkcji życiowych.

Key.Original: Someone else is already reviving this person
Key.Polish: Ktoś inny aktualnie reanimuje tę osobę

Key.Original: This person either respawned or was already revived.
Key.Polish: Ta osoba wcześniej się odrodziła lub została reanimowana.

Key.Original: You have revived %1 and received $%2 for your services.
Key.Polish: Reanimowałeś %1 i za uratowanie życia otrzymałeś $%2.

Key.Original: You got to far away from the body.
The robbery has failed due to unknown reasons
Key.Polish: Napad się nie udał z niewiadomych powodów.

Key.Original: $%1 was stolen from the robbery on the federal reserve
This vault is already being robbed by someone else
Key.Polish: Skarbiec jest aktualnie rabowany przez inną osobę.

Key.Original: This vault was already robbed recently
Automatically reveals nearest objects within 15m, turn this setting off if you are experiencing performance issues.
Key.Polish: Automatycznie wykrywa najbliższe obiekty w promieniu 15m, wyłącz tę opcję jeśli masz problemy z wydajnością

Key.Original: Switch side-channel mode, turn this off if you don't want to talk with players from your side.
Key.Polish: Przełącznik trybu side-channel, to wyłączyć, jeśli nie chce rozmawiać z graczami z boku.

Key.Original: Switch player's broadcast mode, turn this off if you don't want to see any broadcast from other players.
Controls whether or not players will have name tags above their head.
Key.Polish: Kontroluje czy gracze będą mieli nad głowami swoje Tagi z nazwą

Key.Original: You can buy a garage at this house for $%1. You must first purchase the house!
Sending request to server for player information UID [%1]
Key.Polish: Wysyłam żądanie do serwera po informację o fraczu UID [%1]

Key.Original: The server didn't find any player information matching your UID, attempting to add player to system.
Key.Polish: Serwer nie odnalazł informacji zgodnych z UID, dodaję gracza do bazy danych.

Key.Original: There was an error in trying to setup your client.
Key.Polish: Wystąpił błąd w trakcie ustawiania klienta

Key.Original: You have already used the sync option, you can only use this feature once every 5 minutes.
Key.Polish: Użyłeś niedawno opcji synchronizacji, możesz jej używać maksymalnie co 5 minut.

Key.Original: Syncing player information to the server.\n\nPlease wait up to 20 seconds before leaving.
Key.Polish: Synchronizuję informację z serwere, .\n\nProszę poczekać ok 20 sekund przed opuszczeniem serwera

Key.Original: Because you robbed the bank you can't use the ATM for %1 minutes.
Key.Polish: Z uwagi na to że okradłeś bank nie możesz korzystać z bankomatu przez najbliższe %1 minut.

Key.Original: You didn't choose the clothes you wanted to buy.
Key.Polish: Nie wybrałeś ubrań które chcesz kupić.

Key.Original: Sorry sir, you don't have enough money to buy those clothes.
Key.Polish: Przepraszam, ale nie masz tyle pieniędzy aby kupić to ubranie.

Key.Original: There are no vehicles near to sell.
Key.Polish: W pobliżu nie ma pojazdu do sprzedania.

Key.Original: There was a problem opening the chop shop menu.
Key.Polish: Powstał problem przy otwieraniu menu dziupli

Key.Original: You need to be a civilian to use this store!
Key.Polish: Musisz być cywilem aby móc kupować w tym sklepie!

Key.Original: You need to be a cop to use this store!
Key.Polish: Musisz być policjantem aby kupować w tym sklepie!

Key.Original: You don't have rebel training yet!
You need a Diving license to use this shop!
Key.Polish: Nie posiadasz licencji nurka aby kupować w tym sklepie!

Key.Original: You need a %1 to buy from this shop!
Key.Polish: Potrzebujesz %1 by kupować w tym sklepie!

Key.Original: There is currently a car there.
You do not have enough money on you or in your bank to get your car back.
Key.Polish: Nie masz tyle pieniędzy na koncie aby wyciągnąć samochód.

Key.Original: You did not pick a vehicle!
You do not have enough cash to purchase this vehicle.\n\nAmount Lacking: $%1
Key.Polish: Nie masz tyle pieniędzy by kupić ten pojazd.\n\nBrakuje: $%1

Key.Original: You do not have the required license and/or level!
There is a vehicle currently blocking the spawn point
Key.Polish: Inny pojazd blokuje miejsce odrodzenia pojazdów

Key.Original: You are not allowed to use this shop!
Key.Polish: Nie jesteś uprawniony do używania tego sklepu!

Key.Original: You need to select an item to buy.
You didn't enter an actual number
You don't have that many items to sell!
Key.Polish: Nie masz tak dużo rzeczy do sprzedania!

Key.Original: The gang has enough funds to pay for this, would you like to pay with the gangs funds or your own?
Key.Polish: Gang posiada wystarczającą ilość środków aby za to zapłacić, chcesz zapłacić za to środkami gangu, czy własnymi?

Key.Original: Pay with cash or gang funds
You bought %1 %2 for $%3 with the gangs funds
You need to select an item to buy/sell.
Key.Polish: Musisz wybrać rzecz którą chcesz kupić/sprzedać

Key.Original: You bought a %1 for <t color='#8cff9b'>$%2</t> with the gangs funds.
Key.Polish: Kupiłeś %1 za <t color='#8cff9b'>$%2</t> ze środków gangu.

Key.Original: You will receive your next paycheck in %1 minutes.
Key.Polish: Otrzymasz kolejną wypłatę w ciągu %1 minut.

Key.Original: You have missed a paycheck because you were dead.
Key.Polish: Ominęła cię wypłata ponieważ byłeś martwy.

Key.Original: You have received a paycheck of $%1.
The vehicle is too far or you are in!
Key.Polish: Pojazd jest zbyt daleko lub jesteś w!

Key.Original: Driving on the wrong side of the road
Flying over the city without authorization

Key.Polish: Stacja benzynowa ma wystarczającą ilość paliwa.

Key.Original: This gas station is supplied through a pipeline.
Key.Polish: Ta stacja gaz jest dostarczany rurociągiem.

Key.Original: You are not white-listed to use this slot.
You are not allowed to use this slot because you do not have the appropriate permissions. Try another slot.
Key.Polish: Nie wolno korzystać z tego gniazda, ponieważ nie masz odpowiednich uprawnień. Spróbuj użyć innego gniazda.
Jesteś na czarnej liście od policjantów.

Key.Original: You are not allowed to be a cop due to previous actions and the admins have removed you from being a cop.
Key.Polish: Nie mogą być policjantem z powodu wcześniejszych działań oraz administratorzy usunęli cię od bycia policjantem.

Key.Original: You were detected by the SpyGlass.
You were detected for cheating and have been reported to the server. Enjoy your day.
Key.Polish: Ty wykryto oszustwo i zostały zgłoszone do serwera. Miłego dnia.

Key.Original: picked up $%1 from the ground. Bank Balance: $%2 On Hand Balance: $%3
%1 - %2 picked up $%3 from the ground. Bank Balance: $%4 On Hand Balance $%5
robbed $%1 from %2. Bank Balance: $%3 On Hand Balance: $%4
%1 - %2 robbed $%3 from %4. Bank Balance: $%5 On Hand Balance: $%6
bought a house for $%1. Bank Balance: $%2 On Hand Cash: $%3
%1 - %2 bought a house for $%3. Bank Balance: $%4 On Hand Cash: $%5
sold a house for $%1. Bank Balance: $%2
%1 - %2 sold a house for $%3. Bank Balance: $%4
chopped vehicle %1 for $%2 On Hand Cash(pre-chop): $%3
%1 - %2 chopped vehicle %3 for $%4 On Hand Cash(pre-chop): $%5
bought vehicle %1 for $%2. On Hand Cash: $%3 Bank Balance: $%4
%1 - %2 bought vehicle %3 for $%4. On Hand Cash: $%5 Bank Balance $%6
sold vehicle %1 for $%2. Bank Balance: $%3 On Hand Balance: $%4
%1 - %2 sold vehicle %3 for $%4. Bank Balance: $%5 On Hand Balance: $%6
withdrew $%1 from their gang bank. Gang Bank Balance: $%2 Bank Balance: $%3 On Hand Balance: $%4
%1 - %2 withdrew $%3 from their gang bank. Gang Bank Balance: $%4 Bank Balance: $%5 On Hand Balance: $%6
deposited $%1 into their gang bank. Gang Bank Balance: $%2 Bank Balance: $%3 On Hand Balance: $%4
%1 - %2 deposited $%3 into their gang bank. Gang Bank Balance: $%4 Bank Balance: $%5 On Hand Balance: $%6
withdrew $%1 from their bank. Bank Balance: $%2 On Hand Balance: $%3
%1 - %2 withdrew $%3 from their bank. Bank Balance: $%4 On Hand Balance: $%5
transferred $%1 to %2. Bank Balance: $%3 On Hand Balance: $%4
%1 - %2 transferred $%3 to %4. Bank Balance: $%5 On Hand Balance: $%6
deposited $%1 into their bank. Bank Balance: $%2 On Hand Balance: $%3
%1 - %2 deposited $%3 into their bank. Bank Balance: $%4 On Hand Balance: $%5
You have been released automatically for excessive restrainment time
You have been restrained by someone.
